## ScrollbarPair class

Class for a pair of scrollbars. Horizontal and vertical.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ScrollbarPair 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(workspace, addHorizontal, addVertical, opt\_class, opt\_margin)](./blockly.scrollbarpair._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ScrollbarPair</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [corner\_](./blockly.scrollbarpair.corner_.md) |  | SVGRectElement \| null |  |
|  [hScroll](./blockly.scrollbarpair.hscroll.md) |  | [Scrollbar](./blockly.scrollbar.md) \| null |  |
|  [vScroll](./blockly.scrollbarpair.vscroll.md) |  | [Scrollbar](./blockly.scrollbar.md) \| null |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [canScrollHorizontally()](./blockly.scrollbarpair.canscrollhorizontally.md) |  | Returns whether scrolling horizontally is enabled. |
|  [canScrollVertically()](./blockly.scrollbarpair.canscrollvertically.md) |  | Returns whether scrolling vertically is enabled. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.scrollbarpair.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this pair of scrollbars. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.scrollbarpair.isvisible.md) |  | If any of the scrollbars are visible. Non-paired scrollbars may disappear when they aren't needed. |
|  [resize()](./blockly.scrollbarpair.resize.md) |  | Recalculate both of the scrollbars' locations and lengths. Also reposition the corner rectangle. |
|  [resizeContent(hostMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.resizecontent.md) |  | Recalculates the scrollbars' locations within their path and length. This should be called when the contents of the workspace have changed. |
|  [resizeView(hostMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.resizeview.md) |  | Recalculates the scrollbars' locations on the screen and path length. This should be called when the layout or size of the window has changed. |
|  [set(x, y, updateMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.set.md) |  | Set the handles of both scrollbars. |
|  [setContainerVisible(visible)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.setcontainervisible.md) |  | Set whether this scrollbar's container is visible. |
|  [setVisible(visible)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.setvisible.md) |  | Sets the visibility of any existing scrollbars. |
|  [setX(x)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.setx.md) |  | Set the handle of the horizontal scrollbar to be at a certain position in CSS pixels relative to its parents. |
|  [setY(y)](./blockly.scrollbarpair.sety.md) |  | Set the handle of the vertical scrollbar to be at a certain position in CSS pixels relative to its parents. |
